title: Programming Practical Skills Enhancement: Culture-Based E-Learning Design and Usability Evaluation for Mathematical Tasks

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish e-learning interfaces reflecting cultural design differences with 90% accuracy.
Learners can diagnose and analyze the cultural suitability of a mathematics e-learning module using usability evaluation tools (SUS/UEQ).
Learners can design and implement at least three mathematical problem-solving scenarios reflecting cultural contexts through project-based learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
